instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the performance of the model in the related study for on-scene drug detection and how far can this metric go?
Output:
The metric chosen to evaluate the performance of the model is the true-positive rate and true-negative rate. The true-positive rate measures the proportion of actual positive cases that are correctly identified as positive, while the true-negative rate measures the proportion of actual negative cases that are correctly identified as negative.

instruction: What is the practical applicability of the multistage machine learning algorithms used in the related study for on-scene drug detection?
Output: The practical applicability of the multistage machine learning algorithms used in the related study for on-scene drug detection is that they can confidently detect cocaine in case samples using small-wavelength-range near-infrared (NIR) spectroscopy. These algorithms can not only determine the presence of cocaine but also predict the concentration and sample composition. The model based on over 10,000 spectra from case samples achieved high accuracy with 97% true-positive and 98% true-negative results. The on-scene approach allows the model to adapt quickly to changes in the illicit-drug market by updating metadata with results from subsequent laboratory analyses. This demonstrates that the advanced machine learning strategies applied on limited-range NIR spectra from economic handheld sensors can be a valuable procedure for rapid on-site detection of illicit substances by investigating officers.

instruction: How does the study demonstrate the practical applicability of small-wavelength-range near-infrared (NIR) spectroscopy for on-scene drug detection?
Output: The study demonstrates the practical applicability of small-wavelength-range near-infrared (NIR) spectroscopy for on-scene drug detection by using multistage machine learning algorithms to confidently detect cocaine in case samples. The model, based on more than 10,000 spectra from case samples, yielded high true-positive and true-negative results.
